creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Created attachment 28302
remove mentioning of ldap.jar

I think jndi and the containing ldap driver is contained in every jre at least since jdk 1.4.x, so we don't need to advise anyone to copy ldap.jar into $CATALINA_HOME/lib.

creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
Another thanks, Felix.

Applied to trunk (r1243034), tc 7 (r1243045), tc 6 (r1243047) and tc 5.5 (r1243047).

I also removed mentioning jndi.jar in another docs page in r1243047 (also backported).

I did not remove those refernces from the TC 5.5 build system, because although they seem to be not actually used I didn'T want to risk breaking the TC 5.5 build so close to EOL.

Regards,

Rainer
